---
title: "Reference population rates, extracted from NIOSH LTAS"
date: "July 11, 2019"
output: html_document
---

The `.csv` files in the current directory were generated by exporting the rate tables listed under rate file `92 underlying cause U.S. Death Rates 1940-2009` of the NIOSH LTAS software (version 4.5). Note that the LTAS software may require the installation of additional software, including Microsoft SQL Express. During the configuration of SQL Express, be sure to install all the data tools, which may not be installed under the basic installation setup. Also check that the .NET framework 3.0 is enabled.

# Key

## Gender

1 indicates male gender, 2 indicates female gender

## Race

1 indicates white race, 2 indicates all other races

## Causes of death

```{r, echo= F, warning=F}
library(data.table)
library(pander)
niosh.key <- fread("minor-key.tsv")
pander(niosh.key[,-3],
			 justify = 'll')
```
